SECRETARY
July 29, 1925
Dear Dr. Carter:
div1.p:
I am enclosing for your information copy of a letter
dated July 8, 1925, from Dr. Lorente, Director of Health for
Peru, enclosing copy of his letter of June 15 to Dr. Pareja,
Director of Health for Ecuador, with reference to the rumors
of yellow fever in northern Peru. We have asked Dr. Lorente
to send us if possible histories of suspicious cases, autopsy
reports, and sections of pathological material.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, F F Russell Dr. Henry R. Carter
2122 California Street, N.W.
